about_the_game:
KIMÆRA (Pronounced Kim-Era) is a creature-centric, real-time RPG adventure game.

Created as a love-letter to 1990’s and 2000’s creature-collector and adventure games, KIMÆRA takes genre conventions and skews them on a new axis!

In the world of KIMÆRA, the whole Forista region is yours to explore! As you do, you’ll meet the people, wildlife, and ever-mysterious kimaera creatures that call it home. See where your journey takes you!

—

  • Meet and befriend over 100 different species of kimaera! 

  • Encounter and befriend kimaera in the wild, and discover unique palettes for each kimaera depending on where they’re found!

  • Spar with other teams throughout the region in action-based, real-time combat! Opponent squads, wild kimaera, apex kimaera, and story combat– do any of them to gain experience and get stronger!

  • Sparring not your thing? Take it easy and relax in one of the garden locations, where you can hatch eggs, raise kimaera, and earn experience that way!

  • Fill out your encyclopedia!

  • Explore a narrative story through the eyes of Sage, who, along with their friends, sets out with courage to explore Forista!

What secrets will you find?

What will you uncover?

Where will your journey take you?

At the end, who will you be? 

Familiar, or different?

No matter what, it will still be you.

Let’s take that journey, together.

—

KIMÆRA is in active development. Please be aware the game will be adjusted and updated over time. All screenshots and footage of gameplay are subject to change.

short_description: KIMÆRA is a creature-centric, real-time RPG adventure game. Befriend kimæra in the wild and assemble your own squad to explore the world, or peacefully raise kimæra in lush gardens instead. Spar alongside your squad, make new allies, and take part in unraveling a beautiful mystery!
